General.Name: Papago Inc.
General.Description: Papago Inc. engages in the development and sale of software and hardware for satellite navigation systems in Taiwan and internationally. The company offers face recognition solutions; GPS satellite navigation products, such as handheld navigation, car navigation, and vehicle mounted android machine products; smart life products; and driving recorders. It offers its products online, as well as through retail stores. The company was founded in 1990 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
